named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getAverageDay
named-query.query: select new MinuteActivity( activity.time, avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by activity.time order by activity.time

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getAverageDayBetweenDates
named-query.query: select new MinuteActivity( activity.time, avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where (:start is null or activity.date > :start) and (:end is null or activity.date < :end) and activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by activity.time order by activity.time

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getAverageDayByWeekday
named-query.query: select new uk.co.ticklethepanda.health.activity.domain.MinuteActivityByDayOfWeek( weekday(activity.date) + 1, activity.time, avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by weekday(activity.date), activity.time order by weekday(activity.date), activity.time

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getAverageDayByMonth
named-query.query: select new uk.co.ticklethepanda.health.activity.domain.MinuteActivityByMonth( month(activity.date), activity.time, avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by month(activity.date), activity.time order by month(activity.date), activity.time

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getEarliestDateOfActivity
named-query.query: select min(activity.date) from MinuteActivity as activity

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getSumOfStepsByMonth
named-query.query: select new uk.co.ticklethepanda.health.activity.domain.ActivitySumByMonth( month(activity.date), avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by month(activity.date)

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getSumOfStepsByDayOfWeek
named-query.query: select new uk.co.ticklethepanda.health.activity.domain.ActivitySumByDayOfWeek( weekday(activity.date) + 1, avg(activity.steps) ) from MinuteActivity as activity where activity.date in ( select activity.date from MinuteActivity as activity group by activity.date having sum(activity.steps) > 0 ) group by weekday(activity.date)

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getSumOfSteps
named-query.query: select sum(activity.steps) from MinuteActivity as activity

named-query.name: MinuteActivity.getSumOfStepsBetween
named-query.query: select sum(activity.steps) from MinuteActivity as activity where (:start is null or activity.date > :start) and (:end is null or activity.date < :end)
